title: The Nema Williams Episode | Episode 19
itunes:title: The Nema Williams Episode | Episode 19
description:
Karlous invites our first white guest - comedian friend Nema Williams to the show to talk comedy. Beginning his career in comedy, playing black crowds, every single thing he learned in jail and we somehow got into white privelege. Download, listen and share! #ThisPodcastisFor #85SouthShow

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
